    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Spoznavajmo značilnosti glasbe (Ljudska - Prvo leto služim)</string>
            <string language="en">Music characteristics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikeigenschaften</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caractéristiques de musique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Características da música</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteristiche di musica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτηριστικά μουσικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Características de la música</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Pripovedujem zgodbo Strička Jožeta. Povem, da se bodo v današnji uri naučili novo ljudsko pesem.</string>
            <string language="en">Teaching about music characteristics by analyzing folk song \"Prvo leto služim\".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prvo leto služim</string>
            <string language="en">prvo leto služim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">značilnost</string>
            <string language="en">characteristic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ljudska pesem</string>
            <string language="en">folk song</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterricht über Musikeigenschaften durch das 
Analysieren des Volkslied \"Prvo leto slu?im \".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enseignement au sujet des caractéristiques de 
musique en analysant le slu?im folklorique de leto de \"Prvo de 
chanson \".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ensino sobre características da música 
analisando o slu?im popular do leto do \"Prvo da canção \".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insegnamento circa le caratteristiche di musica 
analizzando lo slu?im piega di leto di \"Prvo di canzone \".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διδασκαλία για τα χαρακτηριστικά μουσικής με την 
ανάλυση του λαϊκού leto slu?im \ τραγουδιού \"Prvo".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enseñanza sobre características de la música 
analizando el slu?im popular del leto del \"Prvo de la canción \".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">prvo leto slu?im</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">charakteristisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Volkslied</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">slu?im de leto de prvo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">caractéristique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chanson folklorique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">slu?im do leto do prvo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">característico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">canção popular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">slu?im di leto di prvo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caratteristico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">canzone piega</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">leto prvo slu?im</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">característico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">canción popular</string>
          </keyword>
